resources.string:
1. Connect a wired headset to the phone

 	2. Verify that the Google app is enabled

 	3. Tap the headset hook button many times

 	4. Observe a stream of KEYCODE_MEDIA_* events

 	5. Disable the Google app

 	6. Tap the headset hook button many times

 	7. Observe a stream of KEYCODE_HEADSETHOOK events
